Description:
Spacious 1 Bedroom Apartment
This spacious apartment will impress, a low maintenance lifestyle within Pentridge Village. It offers a generous bedroom with built in robe, sparkling bathroom and an up to date kitchen with stainless steel appliances. Large lounge room with recycle air-conditioner/heating, separate laundry and a balcony with views over the historic bluestone buildings. A secure covered car space is included. Close by to local cafes, walk to Coburg Lake and parklands. Trams and bustling Sydney Road within minutes.
Currently leased $320p/w
Lease expires March 2018
Agent; Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd
Insights: 202b/41-43 Stockade Avenue, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2017 and 26 other 1 bedroom unit in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Divine Art Deco with Room to Move
Set on a deep block of land complete with side and rear ROW, this enchanting home presents an environment of immediate comfort and character along with exciting opportunities for those looking to enhance and expand. Retaining all its period charm, the home's impeccable interior comprises two bedrooms (large master) and study, central bathroom and second WC, elegant lounge with gas-log fireplace and adjoining dining room through to the timber-cabinet kitchen with gas cooker. Impressive features include ducted heating and split-system a/c, new carpets, original Art Deco ceilings, stained timberwork and polished hardwood floors, plus a deep backyard garden with garage/workshop and additional off-street parking space via ROW. Wonderfully quiet yet incredibly convenient, it's walking distance to parks and playgrounds, Coburg Station and vibrant shopping precinct, Sydney Road cafes and trams, local primary schools (St Fidelis and Coburg West). Position, poise and potential! Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd
Insights: 17 Kelson Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2018 and 58 other 2 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Beautiful Today, Brilliant Tomorrow
The generous family proportions of this desirably situated four bedroom home, entirely user friendly today, are accompanied by a 694sqm allotment offering tempting further scope tomorrow, STCA, in a tightly held cul-de-sac setting close to the parkland expanses and bike paths that border Merri Creek. Separate living and kitchen/dining spaces convey the classic comfort created by previous updating before revealing hugely rewarding rear garden dimensions, currently accompanied by convenient secure storage sheds and convenient off street car parking. An ideal example of a property where the present day appeal and the further family potential form an irresistible partnership.

Description:
Take Your Place In Attractive Locale
The future looks bright in this appealing street where you'll find this neat two/three bedroom Californian Bungalow style home on approximately 406m2 presenting various enticing options for the future. Tightly held by one family for approximately 90 years, it's immediately comfortable and presents prime options including updating, extending, building anew and developing (subject to council approval). Currently with a lounge room, kitchen/dining and sitting room, the home also offers a rear garden. Two double bedrooms are complemented by a study/third bedroom, and the residence hosts a central bathroom and second shower. There's also heating, cooling, a side driveway, carport and rear ROW, and great proximity to transport, reserves, lively Sydney Road and Coburg Market.
Insights: 11 Gilbert Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2017 and 146 other 3 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Instant Appeal with Corner Block Credentials
Occupying one of Coburg's largest corner blocks (approx 715sqm), this distinctive home provides an immediately spacious and comfortable family lifestyle along with a world of opportunities for those looking to enhance, renew or redevelop (STCA). Towering ceilings throughout, the home's pristine interior comprises three genuinely large bedrooms, central bathroom and additional powder room (second WC), spacious lounge through to the open family/dining area and adjoining kitchen with dishwasher. Other highlights include split-system heating and cooling, full-size laundry, security shutters, plus a unique wrap-around verandah (three and a half sides), established gardens, backyard with secure off-street parking (via Kendall Street). South of Bell Street walking distance to Coburg Station, it's also close to Coburg's renowned market precinct, Sydney Road trams, cafes and shops. Corner potential in a prime location - what an opportunity!

Description:
A feeling of Elegance & Character!
In one of Melbournes most desired suburbs this distinctive, executive style home is sure to impress either the owner occupier or astute investor alike. Finished to a superior level of quality and immaculately presented, the home has been respectfully enhanced to boast a fresh, functional and naturally lit open plan layout lending itself entirely to a comfortable, modern lifestyle.
This home exudes a feeling of elegance and character, magnified by three metre high ceilings, polished original 150mm wide Baltic pine timber flooring and traditional cornice. The highly desirable northern light filters through the open plan living and dining zones, whilst year round comfort is of upmost priority with a Jetmaster Heat and Glo gas log fire place and Fujitsu split system. The stylish kitchen features an abundance of storage with custom built shaker style cabinetry, Caesar stone bench tops, tiled splash back, under mount double sink and stainless steel appliances including a Bosch dishwasher and Emilia freestanding electric oven and gas stove top
Timber bi-fold doors open onto an outdoor entertainment area protected by an impressive high pitched ceiling, overlooking a spacious and private rear garden perfect for year round alfresco dining and enjoyment. A remote controlled roller door, allows access via the right of way (ROW) which connects to an insulated garage and laundry. This is a versatile space, limited only by your imagination, ideal for an office, home gym, studio or car garage.
The master bedroom suite comprises a generous sized walk in wardrobe, French bay window with storage and Fujitsu split system. Floor to ceiling tiles in the ensuite emanate luxury, only enhanced by a 900mm hanging vanity with Caesar stone and a frameless glass walk in shower, fittingly equipped with a rainwater shower head. A central bathroom services the second and third bedroom and reflects the same luxurious standard, adding to it a floating timber vanity and large shower over bath.
Within walking distance to public transport, Upfield bike path and the vibrant Sydney, Moreland and Melville Roads which includes cafes, restaurants this property is truly a masterpiece, come and see for yourself!
Insights: 146 other 3 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Design Excellence and Cutting-Edge Style
With its own street frontage and no shared land, this bold and beautiful townhouse delivers a lifestyle of absolute quality and class with its spacious interior, long list of luxuries and prime location just north of Brunswick's border. Beyond the striking facade, discover a stunning interior showcasing three generous bedrooms (all with robes) and two deluxe bathrooms - each with concealed cisterns and floor-to-ceiling tiles. Add to this a stylish kitchen with Franke double sink and Miele appliances, expansive and light-filled open living/dining area with stacker doors revealing a wide terrace complete with city skyline views. Other features include heating and cooling, soft-close drawers/cupboards and stone benchtops throughout, hardwood floors, alarm and video intercom, ducted vacuum, double-glazed windows and doors, solar/gas hot water, plus rear courtyard, internally-accessed garage and additional driveway parking space. Close to a range of lifestyle attractions including Melville Road trams and Moreland Station, local parks, popular primary schools and vibrant shopping precincts, as well as easy access to Citylink. Fully-optioned modern living!
Insights: 1a Queen Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2017 and 146 other 3 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
The Avenue Awaits You
Take your place in The Avenue by breathing new life into this well located three bedroom Edwardian. Exhibiting generous proportions, high ceilings and individual character, the single fronted home welcomes in easterly sunlight and offers distinct living and dining rooms and a kitchen/meals domain with walk-in pantry. Three double bedrooms (most with built-in robes) share a bathroom and there's a separate laundry, plus an external powder room adjoining a garage, which accesses a wide rear ROW. The scope for transformation is huge with the home close to a blank canvas at present - use your creativity and bring about a stunning transformation (subject to council approval) and enjoy a position close to schools and a short walk to trains and the many highlights of cosmopolitan Sydney Road including cafes, restaurants, bars, trams and shops.
Insights: 6 The Avenue, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2017 and 146 other 3 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Elegance and Opportunity in a Prime Location
Beyond its picket-fenced garden and gorgeous facade, this late-Edwardian gem provides a lifestyle of instant warmth and character along with outstanding potential to further enhance and possibly expand (STCA). In a blissfully quiet yet enviably convenient Coburg neighbourhood, the home's immaculate interior comprises three bedrooms, bathroom and separate WC, elegant central lounge through to the dining area and adjoining kitchen with dishwasher. Other highlights include ducted heating throughout, alarm system, high ceilings and original lead-light windows, fresh carpets, full-size laundry, plus an expansive backyard with undercover patio, established gardens, watertank, storage shed and ROW potential. Complete with front off-street parking space, it's walking distance to the Coburg Station and renowned shopping centre, Sydney Road cafes and trams, as well as easy access to local parks and popular schools. Enjoy now, extend later!

Description:
The Classic Bungalow, Reinvented
The grand proportion of this superbly renovated four bedroom Californian Bungalow delivers the clean lines and airy living domain suited to modern families. A striking façade and decorative door open to a sunlit entrance hall presenting huge bedrooms with BIR's and stylish bathroom with freestanding bath, the master with luxury ensuite. Crisp white walls and hardwood floors form a timeless backdrop to expansive living spaces and CaesarStone kitchen featuring soft close cabinetry and stainless steel appliances. Spilling to an entertainer's deck and manicured gardens, the scene is set for seamless indoor-outdoor living, all made comfortable with heating, cooling, and OSP via ROW. Enviably positioned to bustling Sydney Road cafes and specialty shopping, transport, parks and schools.

Description:
Exquisite Family Abode
Presiding over a corner allotment in a leafy locale, this sublime five bedroom plus study residence masterfully melds classic and contemporary architecture to deliver a stunning family environment. Taking full advantage of uplifting northerly light, a breathtaking living, dining and kitchen leads to a very generous paved backyard, perfect for relaxing and entertaining. Bi-fold doors link the backyard to an automatic double garage, extending options for social gatherings. A sitting room presents a further leisure space to share, and all bedrooms are spacious. Four of these bedrooms host desks and built-in or walk-in robes, with two sharing a central ensuite. The main bedroom benefits from a walk-in robe and fully tiled ensuite, and there's a third bathroom. Capped by graceful features including lofty ceilings, leadlight, rosettes, plantation shutters, timber fretwork and fireplaces, the home also has hydronic heating, cooling, a ducted vacuum system and storage. A stroll to parkland, trams and schools, and close to vibrant Sydney Road, it simply exceeds expectations.
Insights: 121 Rennie Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2017 and 12 other 5 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Live The Lifestyle You've Always Wanted
This delightful and spacious multi level 3 bedroom Townhouse in the heart of Pentridge Village is one to put on your must inspect list!
Freshly painted and with new carpets, here you'll find outstanding quality over three levels! With a well thought out floor plan, the spaciousness will definitely impress. Comprising of 3 good sized bedrooms with built in robe and walk in robe to the master bedroom, a formal lounge, 2 bathrooms, the spacious open plan living with modern kitchen/dining create a tranquil environment to relax or entertain family and friends.

Walking distance to Sydney Rd. transport, shops, Cafe's, Coburg Lake park land and Schools only moments away.

Description:
A Leafy Lifestyle Awaits
Within the established Pentridge Estate, walking distance to Coburg Lake, Sydney Rd Tram, Batman Train Station and schools, this family orientated property offers outstanding lifestyle appeal. The sophisticated and elegant interiors of this classic town residence cater for total comfort with top-quality fittings and loads of contemporary style. Accommodation is cleverly designed over three levels, with tiled entry access to a large remote garage and an extra 40 Sqm of space with potential for a Home/office, rumpus or games room at street level. First level you will find the formal lounge with balcony and an open plan casual living/dining which includes stylish hostess kitchen with stainless steel appliances and stone benchtops, complimented with quality timber floors, alfresco entertaining and low-maintenance garden with rear access. Top level consists of spacious retreat/study area, three good sized bedrooms of which the master includes walk in robe, ensuite and balcony with sweeping views towards the evergreen streetscape. Oversized family bathroom with spa bath.
Added features include: Quality new carpet, central heating, refrigerated air-conditioning and walks along Lake Reserve, wining & dining in nearby Sydney Road and all modes of transport are yours to enjoy once you move in and all within walking distance whilst still being only 8km from CBD.

Description:
Easy-Living Family Excellence
With its spacious design, quality features throughout and sought-after location, this two-storey home presents a high-quality, low-maintenance lifestyle opportunity in a family-focused neighbourhood with easy access to the best of Coburg. Beyond its landscaped front garden and distinctive facade, discover an inviting interior comprising three bedrooms (large master with fitted WIR and balcony), study/home office, spacious main bathroom with spa and additional powder room (second WC). Versatile living spaces include a light-filled lounge, upstairs retreat and open-plan family/dining areas complemented by a well-appointed kitchen with Blanco cooking appliances and dishwasher. Other highlights of the home include ducted heating and evaporative cooling, ducted vacuum, alarm system, large laundry and under-stair storeroom, plus a private north-facing courtyard and double garage with internal entry. Close to Coburg West and St Fidelis primary schools, Strathmore Secondary College (zoned), public transport options, shopping precincts, easy access to airports and CBD via Citylink/Tullamarine Freeway. Simply move in and enjoy everything this prized location has to offer!
Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd
Inspections By Appointment
Insights: 2A Portland Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2017 and 146 other 3 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Brick Veneer Unit with Homely Feel!
'The Grove' prestige address, this 2 bedroom villa unit sits pretty at the back of the block & offers a great lifestyle!
Like a little home, the floor plan includes; spacious & bright living/dining room, hallway leading to 2 bedrooms both with ceiling fans. Large kitchen/meals with gas cook top. Retro, pastel pink and blue bathroom with sep toilet, laundry taps.
Extra-large courtyard - perfect for a veggie patch & a bbq! Carport on title.
Enjoy every convenience at your fingertips including; Sydney Road restaurants, shops, city tram - CBD approx. 7.5km. Just over 1km to Moreland station & Merri Creek Trail at the end of your street.
Superbly located on one of the best streets, this is it!
Insights: 6/51 The Grove, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2017.

Description:
An Edwardian that transcends time
The balance between period character and contemporary appeal has been beautifully achieved throughout this superb double fronted Edwardian - a home that delivers highly desirable spaces in a location of total convenience close to Coburg station, Sydney Road and schools. Four inviting double bedrooms and two modern bathrooms, including the main bedroom's ensuite, line a traditional, warmly welcoming hall before leading to a versatile central study zone. Beyond, perfect proportions for living and dining are served by a stylish, sparkling kitchen before revealing alfresco dimensions that entertain with designer flair. Gleaming hardwood floorboards, substantial separate laundry, huge attic storage, ducted vacuum, 25 solar panels and a secure internally accessed double garage are only the start of the story told by a home that meets every imaginable lifestyle need in style.

Description:
Contemporary Living Opposite Parklands
The clean lines of contemporary living are elegantly displayed throughout this three bedroom two bathroom townhouse boasting quality appointments. Featuring formal and informal living zones showcasing lustrous timber floors, this elegant residence boasts a superb Caesarstone kitchen featuring stainless steel appliances and endless counter space, perfectly positioned to service the low maintenance rear courtyard for seamless indoor-outdoor living. Double bedrooms with BIR's are complemented by a spacious family bathroom, the master enjoying WIR's and ensuite with spa bath, while ducted heating, split systems and a single garage with remote and internal entry assure comfort and security. Enviably positioned opposite a park and moments to bustling Sydney Road, trams, Batman Station, Upfield Bike Path, Coburg Lake Reserve and schools, inspection will impress.
Insights: 16 Tanderum Drive, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2017 and 146 other 3 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.
